Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Fission Reactor^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Great! Try this ^orange;advanced dash tech^reset; out and let me know if it works properly!

You can generate a lot of power with a ^orange;Fission Reactor^reset; in your lab. Show you can make one using your ^orange;Power Station^reset; and you can have ^green;this tech upgrade^reset; I just came up with.
